flawed_nl_solution:
After his father gave him 13 biscuits, Randy has 32 + 13 = <<32+13=54>>54 biscuits.
After his mother gave him 15 biscuits, Randy has 54 + 15 = <<54+15=69>>69 biscuits.
After his brother ate 20 of the biscuits. Randy has 69 - 20 = <<69-20=49>>49 biscuits.
#### 49

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 45, not 54. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
